entry.title: rbullock59/periodic-planner: A modern, cross-platform desktop scheduling application built with Tauri and Vite. Features a sleek interface powered by Tailwindcss and shadcn/ui , designed for efficient and customizable planning of science fair events with ease and fairness in mind. Fast, lightweight, and fully open-source.
entry.content: A modern, cross-platform desktop scheduling application built with Tauri and Vite. Features a sleek interface powered by Tailwindcss and shadcn/ui , designed for efficient and customizable planning of science fair events with ease and fairness in mind. Fast, lightweight, and fully open-source.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
